medical_history.chief_complaint: Painful oral and vulvar ulcers, food/toothpaste intolerance.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms developed over several years, with significant improvement noted after starting adalimumab treatment, complete resolution observed after 12 weeks.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Insignificant; patient previously failed topical tacrolimus, clobetasol/orobase, hydroxychloroquine, prednisone, and did not tolerate mycophenolate mofetil or acitretin.
medical_history.social_history: Negative for smoking or alcohol consumption.
